title: Curfew to be lifted from 6 AM to 2 PM on tomorrow (13)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The nation-wide curfew that imposed on Monday (9) due to the violent situation that took place in the country was re-imposed at 2 PM today (12) and will be lifted at 6 AM on Friday (13).
Curfew will thereafter be lifted until 2 PM, and be in effect until 6 AM on Saturday (14).
Cabinet composition still not decided, GotaGoGama should continue – Prime Minister
Looking forward to making Sri Lanka strong again – President congratulates new PM
